coreAttributes.name: low-top skater shoe
coreAttributes.description: A pair of low-top skater shoes, suitable for casual wear. They are primarily constructed of stitched cotton canvas, and have toe caps and soles that are made from flexible rubber.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the skater shoes and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the skater shoes and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the skater shoes and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc.her] skater shoes, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc2.namePos] skater shoes, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc2.namePos] skater shoes, before tugging them off.
